paragraph: Tatsuhisa Suzuki (鈴木 達央, Suzuki Tatsuhisa, born November 11, 1983) is a Japanese voice actor and singer from Ichikawa, Chiba. He is affiliated with I'm Enterprise and Lantis. He is the vocalist of the rock band Oldcodex under his stage name Ta_2.

On August 4, 2021, Suzuki went on hiatus due to poor health issues, following a report published on July 30 by Shūkan Bunshun alleging that he was involved in an extramarital affair with a female work associate. The same report also alleged that Suzuki had possibly violated non-disclosure agreements during the affair regarding music he and Oldcodex had been working on for other anime series. On August 30, 2021, Suzuki released a statement apologizing for his "careless behavior."As a result of his hiatus, he voluntarily stepped down from his role in Ultraman. He was also recast in Kikai Sentai Zenkaiger, the CD bonuses of the game adaptation of My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom!, Pokémon Journeys: The Series, Alchemy Stars, The Misfit of Demon King Academy, and Tokyo Revengers. However, Kyoto Animation confirmed that they were not replacing him in Free!.
Shūkan Bunshun reported that Suzuki was engaged to LiSA in May 2019. In January 2020, the two publicly revealed their relationship and announced they had married.
